divs: sighting detailsit was daylight by 330 a.m. we were outside house and were starteled by white hot light entering from about 55 degrees at our 12 oclock. no tail or obvious meteorite disintegration. i had time to walk up a small slope, and i made some calculations as to its crash\landing site. the location is on land but has a stretch of ocean between it. i heard of no other report, as we thought anyone within a 200 mile radius, including ships would have to have seen it. i had another incident 30 years ago, which i shared with ufon as i was on board of directors. as a counsellor i interviewed claims of sightings,etc. i will keep you posted as to findings. keep up great work.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Victoria
There was one other sighting in Victoria on or around April 23rd 2011
Summary: Was out side with friend, sun was up, sky clear. We both observed a brilliant white light that was visible for a time that belies a meteor, but I have not yet investigated site.
